argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | equsex.1 | |- F/ x ps |
| 2 |  | equsex.2 | |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ps ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_exlimi | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ps ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_equsal | |- ( A. x ( x = y -> ph ) <-> ps ) |
| 6 |  | #P_equs4 | |- ( A. x ( x = y -> ph ) -> E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylbir | |- ( ps -> E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_impbii | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) <-> ps ) |
